snippet: Frank R. Seddio, like his mentor, Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, has vowed to effect long-promised reforms to Democratic Party politics in the borough.
abstract: Frank R Seddio, likely successor to his mentor, Brooklyn Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, has vowed to effect long-promised reforms to Democratic Party politics in the borough; Lopez's rein as the most powerful political force in the borough ended amid allegations of sexual harassment, leading reformers and progressives to call for a clean break from a long legacy of patronage politics.
lead_paragraph: Frank R. Seddio, like his mentor, Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, has vowed to effect long-promised reforms to Democratic Party politics in the borough.

headline.seo: Seddio Is Protégé and Likely Successor of Lopez as Brooklyn Leader
headline.main: Likely Successor to Disgraced Brooklyn Party Leader Is a Friend and Protégé
headline.print_headline: Likely Successor to Disgraced Brooklyn Party Leader Is a Friend and Protégé
